category.name: wcf.global
category.item: Thank you for choosing WoltLab Suite™!
This installer will help you to install WoltLab Suite™.
The installer language is currently set to {@$languageChooser}
Please read the following license agreement. Use the scroll bar to view the entire document.
Do you accept the terms and conditions of the license agreement? You may only install this software upon acceptance of the license agreement.
You must accept the license agreement to continue this installation.
The installed version of the script-language “PHP” is too old for a stable operation of this software. To proceed with the installation, a version update is necessary.
The “pdo_mysql” PHP extension is required to install this software.
The current configuration of the installed “PHP” version does not allow file uploads. Due to this configuration, some features of this software will not be available.
A graphics library is needed to read images and for the dynamic image generation. The GD library or alternatively ImageMagick is required.
The maximum available memory of PHP scripts is too low to properly run the software.
Your PHP version has been compiled without OpenSSL support, it is required to establish secure connections.
Your PHP version has been compiled without cURL support, outgoing connections might not be fully supported.
The host name determined by the web server must match the host name within the web browser's URL bar.
The web browser must send cookies back to the web server.

The setup is accessed via an unencrypted HTTP connection. For privacy and security only encrypted HTTPS connections should be used. Unencrypted connections should be redirected to the encrypted variant. Some features might be unsupported when using unencrypted connections, as web browsers restrict some features for use with encrypted connections only.
The PHP version must support 64-bit integers to correctly process numbers larger than ~2.1 billion.
The installation is currently loading the next step, please wait.
The data for this software needs to be stored in a MySQL or MariaDB-database. Please enter your database access information!

An error has occurred while trying to connect to your database:
{$exception->getMessage()}{if $exception->getPrevious()}
{$exception->getPrevious()->getMessage()}{/if}

The following table{if $conflictedTables|count > 1}s{/if} already exist{if $conflictedTables|count == 1}s{/if} within your “{$dbName}” Database:
{implode from=$conflictedTables item="table"}{$table}{/implode}.

To solve this problem, please do one of the following:
1. Remove the table{if $conflictedTables|count > 1}s{/if} manually and continue the installation with the “Next” button or
2. You re-enter the database access information, but to a different database and continue the installation with the “Next” button.
The installation will now generate an administrator account for you. Please provide username, email address and password.
Errors have occurred while registering the user account, please check the marked fields for errors.
This field can not be left empty.
The username you have given is invalid. A valid username must be between 3 and 20 characters long.
The email address you have given is invalid. A valid email address must be in the format of name@example.com
The email addresses you have given are not identical. For security reasons, please make sure that both email address fields have been filled in and are identical.
The passwords you have given are not identical. For security reasons, please make sure that both password fields have been filled in and are identical.

An Error has accured while extracting the required files:
{$exception->getMessage()}
Please make sure that the destination folder exists and can be written to.
